name: Payroll Accountant
description:
ANOTECH Energy was founded in 2006 to provide engineering & construction consulting services to the energy industry.

From the beginning, we’ve developed our expertise in technical fields of all energy sectors, including Oil and Gas (E&P), Renewable Energies, Nuclear, Refinery, Petrochemical, Civil & Infrastructure, Mining.

ANOTECH operates in over 63 countries worldwide. Headquartered in France (Toulouse and Paris), ANOTECH has also established offices in London, Moscow, Baku, Houston, Abu Dhabi, Singapore and others major energy centers.

Responsibilities:

Ensure accurate, efficient, and timely payroll calculation in 1C and the local ERP system – Unit4 Agresso, including but not limited to the following:

  • Monthly payroll calculations (advance and final payment) for 150-200 employees and freelancers
  • Calculation of vacation, sick leaves, overtimes, bonuses, additional revenues, maternity leave, average salary calculation, regional coefficients, northern allowances, rotational method, etc.
  • Sick lists: calculation and filling
  • Preparation and amending employees’ staff list (T-3)
  • Preparation of basic HR management documents (prikazes T-1, T-5, T-5a, T-6, T-8, Т-11, Т-60, Т-61)
  • Extracting of data from 1C "Payroll and HR" module in a standard form
  • Uploading of data from 1C "Payroll and HR" to 1C Accounting in a standard form
  • Settlement with leaving employees: order, final calculation, and obligatory salary certificates
  • Calculation of unused holiday provision
  • Preparation of salary certificates for employees (2-NDFL, free format for visa, bank, other authorities)
  • Participation in month-end accounts reconciliation (1C and Unit4 Agresso)
  • Participation in monthly, quarterly, and yearly closings
  • Communication with HR, Payroll, Invoicing and Accounting departments on payroll related matters
  • Communication with other departments on general issues
  • Other tasks and duties within present position

Requirements:

  • Higher education in Accounting, Tax, Audit, Finance or related field
  • Relevant experience of at least 3 years
  • Proficiency with 1C "Payroll and HR", 1C "Accounting", and MS Excel
  • At least intermediate level of English, both oral and written
  • Analytical mindset
  • You are autonomous, rigorous, proactive, curious, able to handle multiple priorities
  • Flexibility in adapting to change in a business environment

Conditions:

  • Competitive salary
  • Official employment in accordance with the Labor Code of the Russian Federation
  • Medical Insurance from the first working day
  • Annual salary review, opportunities for professional growth
  • Office in the center of Moscow (Pushkinskaya, Tverskaya)
